member.name: T:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.ResourceDecorator.RequestMethodResourceDecorator
member.summary:
Adds a method to the resource class for each method defined in the resource json. The designed method returns a Requestclass-instance instead of directly executing the requests. All required parameters will be added the the method parameter list, whereas optional ones are left out.
Example: public virtual ListRequest List(string apiName, string apiVersion)

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.SchemaDecorator.ISchemaDecorator
member.summary: Classes that implement this interface will add code to the typeDeclaration based on the ISchema passed in. Example on class may add fields to the typeDeclaration to represent each of the fields described in the schema
Decorates the schema class with the information provided by this decorator. For example a ISchemaDecorator could add a constructor, or properties to the Schema class that we are generating
member.param: Further implementation details for all decorators
Provider which is used for the generation of nested classes

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.SchemaDecorator.INestedClassSchemaDecorator
member.summary: A given schema may contain nested classes, classes that implement this method may decorate those internal classes, often classes that implement this interface will also implement ISchemaDecorator

Decorates the schema class with the information provided by this decorator. For example a INestedClassSchemaDecorator could add a constructor, or properties to the nested schema class that we are generating.
member.param: Provider used for generating nested classes.

member.summary: Implements the additionalProperties tag on this schema if required.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.SchemaDecorator.ArraySchemaDecorator
member.summary: Decorator for schemas which represent an array themself (type: array) This Decorator constructs an IList implementation for the schema

member.summary: Returns the given input string with a lower first letter

member.summary: Returns the specified input string with a upper first letter

member.summary: Checks if the char is a valid first char for a field/variable name.

member.summary: Checks if this char is allowed within field/variable names.

member.summary: Creates a safe member name which can be used within code environments. Also checks for disallowed C# keywords words.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.GeneratorUtils.GenerateAlternativeNamesFor(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary:
Generates a set of alternative names (including the baseName itself) for the specified base name.
Naming schemes used: 1. baseName 2. proposed alternatives 3. baseName + "Member" 4. baseName + Index 5. baseName + "Member" + Index

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.GeneratorUtils.AppendIndices(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a set of strings which represents the baseName plus a number appended to it. Will return an empty set if the provided base name is empty or null.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.GeneratorUtils.MakeValidMemberName(System.String)
member.summary: Removes invalid characters from the proposed member name, and makes the following char upper case if the previous body char was an invalid char (e.g. foo-bar will result in fooBar). May return null if the name consisted only out of invalid characters.

member.summary: Changes the case of the first character.

member.summary: Adds the resource name as a private const field to the generated resource class. This is a standard class so this need to be present or another decorator that add a field with the same name and type.

member.summary: Adds a reference to the IRequestExecutor, this is a standard decorator so must be present or another Decorator that provides adds the same field.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.ResourceDecorator.StandardServiceFieldResourceDecorator.CreateServiceField(System.String)

member.summary: Adds private Google.Apis.Authentication.IAuthenticator authenticator; to the resource class.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Decorator.ResourceDecorator.StandardServiceFieldResourceDecorator.CreateFakeServiceField
member.summary: Adds private BuzzService service { get { return this; } } to the resource class.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.ImplementationDetailsGenerator
member.summary: Generator for the SchemaImplementationDetails class. Scans the resources and other fields of a discovered services to provide additional information for the schema decorators, which cannot be found within the json of a schema. Amongst others used by the ErrorResponseDecorator to find out which schemas are referred by methods.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.ImplementationDetailsGenerator.PropertyClassSuffix
member.summary: Suffix which will be attached to all nested classes for properties which do not refer to a strongly named type.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.ImplementationDetailsGenerator.GenerateDetails(Google.Apis.Discovery.IService)
member.summary: Generates the implementation details for a whole service.

member.summary: Adds implementation details for the specified schema and all its subschemas if they are required/useful.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.ImplementationDetailsGenerator.ProposeNameIfNecessary(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{Newtonsoft.Json.Schema.JsonSchema,Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.SchemaImplementationDetails},System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Schema.JsonSchema)
member.summary: Proposes a name for a schema if it has none yet.

member.summary: Return all required IParemters from the given method. Sorted by proposed order, and alphabeticly for the remaining parameters.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.MethodGeneratorUtils.GetOptionalParameters(Google.Apis.Discovery.IMethod)
member.summary: Return all optional IParameters from the given method. Sorted by proposed order, and alphabeticly for the remaining parameters.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.MethodGeneratorUtils.GetAllParametersSorted(Google.Apis.Discovery.IMethod)
member.summary: Return all IParameters from the given method. Sorted by proposed order, then required, then optional, alphabeticly within those groupings.

member.summary: True if any of the parameters are required

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Tools.CodeGen.Generator.MethodGeneratorUtils.HasOptionalParameters(Google.Apis.Discovery.IMethod)
member.summary: True if any of the parameters are optional
